features.title: High Resolution Chirp Sounder
features.explanation: The High Resolution Chirp Sounder provides exceptional underwater sonar imaging with a focus on clarity and detail. It uses Chirp technology to transmit a range of frequencies, allowing you to see underwater objects and fish with high precision.

features.title: 120Â° Side to Side Coverage
features.explanation: This feature offers a wide-angle coverage of 120 degrees, allowing you to scan a larger area from side to side. It's ideal for detecting fish and underwater structures in a broader underwater field.

features.title: Realtime CDX Mapping
features.explanation: Realtime CDX Mapping provides you with the ability to create detailed underwater maps in real-time. It uses advanced technology to map the seabed, helping you navigate and locate fish more efficiently.

features.title: Realtime 3D View CDX
features.explanation: With Realtime 3D View CDX, you can visualize underwater terrain in three dimensions. This feature offers a dynamic and interactive way to explore the underwater environment and identify potential fishing spots.

features.title: Backscatter License
features.explanation: The Backscatter License enhances your ability to analyze underwater data. It provides access to backscatter imaging, which can reveal additional details about underwater objects and the seabed.

features.title: High Resolution Side Scan
features.explanation: High Resolution Side Scan technology offers exceptional clarity when scanning the sides of your vessel. It's particularly useful for locating fish schools, wrecks, and other objects adjacent to your boat.

features.title: Third-Party Software Integration
features.explanation: This feature allows seamless integration with third-party software applications. You can enhance your fishing experience by using specialized tools and applications in conjunction with your Multibeam Transducer.

features.title: Multiple WASSP Transducers
features.explanation: Having multiple WASSP Transducers on your vessel provides redundancy and increased coverage. It ensures that you have backup transducers in case of failure and extends your scanning capabilities.
